poem:
**Veiled Shadows**

Between borders, in whispers deep,  
plots of death in silence creep.  
A world concealed, intentions dark,  
strikes the heart with unseen bark.  

Yet here we stand, beneath the sky,  
where eagles watch and questions fly.  
In the dance of power, life's charade,  
man's fragile peace in shadow played.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "US justice department files charges over alleged Iranian plot to kill Trump The US justice department is bringing criminal charges over an Iranian plot to kill the president-elect, Donald Trump, that was thwarted by the FBI, the government said. The federal government has unsealed criminal charges in what the justice department said was a murder-for-hire plan to take out Trump before this week’s presidential election, which he won decisively over his Democratic rival, Kamala Harris.". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: US justice department files charges over alleged Iranian plot to kill Trump The US justice department is bringing criminal charges over an Iranian plot to kill the president-elect, Donald Trump, that was thwarted by the FBI, the government said. The federal government has unsealed criminal charges in what the justice department said was a murder-for-hire plan to take out Trump before this week’s presidential election, which he won decisively over his Democratic rival, Kamala Harris.
